article: My name ' s Molly . I ' m a lion . I am three years old . My favorite food is meat and I like to eat little animals . I like the forest , but I live in the zoo now , I live in a big cage . I ca n ' t run and I ca n ' t see my parents , I do n ' t like the zoo or the cage . Every day I get up in the cage , I have breakfast , lunch and dinner in the cage . I sleep in the cage . I really want to run in the forest and live with my parents .
